title: Upper Pingston
whats_it_like: One of B.C.'s best steep creeks. Classic whitewater; continuous, clean, few portages and a handful of bigger rapids. Not much is "must run", but be prepared to run a good amount of class 5 if you put on as either too much portaging or hiking out would be a lot of work and probably end in the dark. If the upper is too high the middle is a good back up option.
scouting_portaging: Scout whenever you think you should. Everything has been run except one short canyon that is portaged on the right.

time.original: 4-8 hours depending on group size and familiarity.

when_to_go: Late June to mid to late July. Usually run as things are coming down from peak runoff.
